news.title: U.S.-Israel launch massive attack on Iran; 4 U.S. military bases hit in retaliation
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump said Iran has continued to pursue nuclear weapons despite ongoing negotiations to end its program. Trump: Iran is pursuing nuclear weapons even as negotiations are ongoing to end program.

news.title: OpenAI strikes deal with Pentagon, hours after rival Anthropic was blacklisted by Trump
news.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says his company has come to terms with the Defense Department for use of its models. Altman said on X that the company has agreed to share its AI technology with the government.

news.title: WBD employees fear coming wave of job losses as Paramount tops Netflix's bid to acquire company
news.summary: WBD employees fear potential job cuts, culture clashes and high debt loads. Paramount supplants Netflix as the company's acquirer. WBD employees worry about job cuts and culture clashes.

news.title: NASA is sending its first Black and first female astronauts to the moon
news.summary: NASA is sending the first Black and first female astronauts to the moon in an upcoming launch. It will be the first journey to the Moon in over 50 years.

news.title: AI just leveled up and there are no guardrails anymore
news.summary: CNBC's Deirdre Bosa goes inside the AI-driven market meltdown, the political fight, and the race that's moving faster than anyone can govern.

news.title: The week, FOBO — ‘fear of becoming obsolete’ because of AI — became real for workers and markets
news.summary: Some CEOs and researchers are skeptical about doomsday scenarios. Massive jobs cuts at Block and a cataclysmic Citrini blog post stoked anxieties.

news.title: My boss told me to dress better. Now I feel uncomfortable. He is a white man and I am a Black woman.
news.summary: "I just feel like you don’t dress for the occasion.” says the manager. "You don't have to dress for it," he adds.

news.title: Can China just steal America’s AI brain that’s costing trillions to develop?
news.summary: American companies are spending enormous sums to develop high-performing AI models. Distillation attacks are attempting to maliciously extract them. Nobody is doing much to stop it.

news.title: ‘I dread the snow’: My heating and air conditioning always breaks down. Do I spend $15K on a new one?
news.summary: “Is there a formula or method for figuring out when replacement becomes more cost-effective than ongoing repairs?” asks the author.

news.title: These fintech stocks are loved by analysts and could bounce back in a big way
news.summary: PayPal and Block are both cheap relative to historic levels. But only one of them commands heavy enthusiasm from analysts. PayPal is the only one that is attracting the most interest from investors.
